customers.name: Customers
customers.description: Customers are users that buy products from the store.

operations.name: Customer Operations
operations.description: Operations that can be performed on customers. These include creating, updating, and deleting customers.

fields.name: Customer Fields
fields.description: Fields that can be used when querying customers.

email.name: Email
email.description: The email address of the customer.

firstName.name: First Name
firstName.description: The first name of the customer.

lastName.name: Last Name
lastName.description: The last name of the customer.

phone.name: Phone
phone.description: The phone number of the customer.

createdAt.name: Created At
createdAt.description: The date and time when the customer was created.

updatedAt.name: Updated At
updatedAt.description: The date and time when the customer was last updated.

invoices.name: Invoices
invoices.description: Invoices are bills for products that have been purchased. Invoices are associated with a customer.
